short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mental health reminders at intervals you control. Boosts well-being, resilience, and satisfaction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We understand a day can be tough. The Mental Health Booster extension is a powerful tool designed to improve users' overall mental well-being, resilience, and satisfaction. This extension operates by providing timely reminders that help users engage in activities and practices that foster better mental health.
